subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 271653
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
953 AM PDT FRI APR 27 2007

..THE LARGE NORTHWEST SWELL WAS BEGINNING TO SUBSIDE THIS MORNING...

SINCE THE NORTHWEST SWELL WAS SUBSIDING THIS MORNING...BREAKERS
ON WEST AND NORTHWEST FACING BEACHES WILL DROP BELOW HIGH SURF
CRITERIA. THE HIGH SURF ADVISORY WILL BE ALLOWED TO EXPIRE AT 10
AM.

CAZ034-035-271800-
/O.EXP.KLOX.SU.Y.0007.000000T0000Z-070427T1700Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
953 AM PDT FRI APR 27 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING...

THE HIGH SURF ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PDT THIS MORNING.

ALTHOUGH BREAKERS ARE EXPECTED TO DROP BELOW 10 FEET...OCCASIONAL
MAXIMUM SETS TO NEAR 10 FEET ARE STILL POSSIBLE INTO THIS
AFTERNOON.

$$

CAZ040-041-271800-
/O.EXP.KLOX.CF.S.0006.000000T0000Z-070427T1700Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
953 AM PDT FRI APR 27 2007

OCCASIONAL BREAKERS OF 4 TO 5 FEET ARE SILL POSSIBLE INTO THE
AFTERNOON...HOWEVER THE WAVES ARE EXPECTED TO SUBSIDE TODAY.

$$

SWEET
